Title: Jakarta, What Have We Done?
Description: An NYC couple is overwhelmed after moving to Jakarta, Indonesia. Jakarta offers space that New York living can't, but with the extra room comes extra problems. Now they're questioning if moving really was the right decision for their family.

Title: Getting Schooled in Nevis
Description: A Minnesota couple and their two small kids swap the suburbs for the island of Nevis, where Dad will attend medical school. He wants the kind of home he's used to, but his wife wants beach access and the conveniences of a condo community.

Title: Fan Faves: Jakarta, What Have We Done?
Description: Check out this fan favorite as a New York couple is overwhelmed after moving to Jakarta, Indonesia, and question if moving was the right decision for their family.

Title: Reclaiming Time, Italian-Style
Description: An interior designer wants to move to Frosinone, Italy for a break from her hectic life.  Although she's got a clear idea of what she wants, most homes in this Italian province don't meet the modern standards she's used to.

Title: Second Goa Round in India
Description: A dressmaker leaves LA to manufacture her line in India, but has some setbacks as her business partnership dissolves and her apartment catches fire. Now she's relying on friends' help and positive manifestation to rebuild, starting with a new home.

Title: Pulling Teeth in Singapore
Description: After a three-year contract in Japan, a military dentist accepts his final station and moves his entire family to Singapore. He thinks they need to go big for this once in a lifetime opportunity; his wife struggles with the notion of planting roots.

Title: Mellowing Out in Chiang Mai
Description: A young teacher, tired from the stresses of American life, gets hooked on the Zen vibe in Thailand during a trip with his brother, and decides to move there. It's a different world from Reading, Pennsylvania, though, and the learning curve will be steep.

Title: Worlds Apart in Bangkok
Description: Newlyweds that dated long distance are moving in together for the first time as they follow her job to Bangkok, Thailand. She's a world traveler looking to live close to her job in the heart of Bangkok, but he's a country boy and is desperate for some peace and quiet.

Title: Worlds Apart in Bangkok
Description: Newlyweds that dated long distance are moving in together for the first time as they follow her job to Bangkok, Thailand. She's a world traveler looking to live close to her job in the heart of Bangkok, but he's a country boy and is desperate for some peace and quiet.

Title: Wedding Can Wait, On Isla Mujeres
Description: An engaged Philadelphia couple decides buy a vacation home before getting married, but picking the house of their dreams becomes an intense negotiation when one half keeps a closer eye on price than the other.

Title: Wedding Can Wait, On Isla Mujeres
Description: An engaged Philadelphia couple decides buy a vacation home before getting married, but picking the house of their dreams becomes an intense negotiation when one half keeps a closer eye on price than the other.

Title: The Quest for Less Stress in Riviera Nayarit
Description: A California couple seeks a slower pace in Mexico. One half is a nurse, and he's ready to park himself on the beach for a well-deserved break. His partner, a landscape architect, wants to get his hands dirty with garden work in his dream jungle home.

Title: Harmony on a Honduran Island
Description: A married couple looks to trade in their busy Charlotte life for a more relaxed existence in Roatan, Honduras. They'd like a house with rental potential to help finances, but won't compromise on the wow factor they're after in their new home.

Title: Taking Their Shot in London
Description: Newlyweds from Chicago met on the college basketball team and are moving to London for a job transfer. Concerned about dependence on a single income, one wants an affordable suburban home, while her wife longs to be in the city, no matter the cost.

Title: Rome, if You Want to
Description: A native Italian wants his career-driven wife to live like the Romans do and take life at a slower speed. Going with the flow comes much more naturally to him, so he'll have his work cut out helping her adjust to Rome's pace.

Title: New Hope in Bogota
Description: After a fire destroyed her house, a young woman decides to start over in Bogota, Colombia, where her boyfriend lives and where much of her professional work is based. She wants a property to renovate and rebuild, but he insists on a practical start to their new beginning.

Title: An Argument in Auckland
Description: These young parents thought they were on the same page when they uprooted their family to New Zealand. Only now they see their ideas for this family venture differ greatly. He wants city life, but for her ocean access is the key to a happy family.

Title: Living it Up and Sizing it Down in Amsterdam
Description: A family of three and their dog have to come to terms with smaller dwellings and limited inventory to make the most of an opportunity to live in Amsterdam. He wants a practical, modern apartment, she wants Dutch charm with less to clean.

Title: Operation Get Little Bro to Move to Tokyo
Description: After three years in West Texas, a military man is excited for a transfer to Tokyo, Japan. He's flying his little brother out in the hopes that he'll move there too, but their sibling rivalry is throwing a hitch into the plan.

Title: Cows and Culture in South Holland
Description: A couple moves to her home country to be closer to family in South Holland, Netherlands. They're looking for two bedrooms and a yard for their dogs, but he wants to be in the city while she's looking for a place with a small town feel.

Title: Scared Sacred in Peru
Description: A single attorney decides to make a drastic change, start a new business and relocate to Peru. She's looking for two bedrooms, two, bathrooms, a mountain view and a place that pet-friendly for her cats.

Title: Digging Into Marriage in Sheffield, England
Description: A newlywed couple moves to Sheffield, England, for the university. They're looking for a house with three bedrooms and a nice yard for their dogs, but finding a place that's near school and in their budget will be a challenge.

Title: A Leap of Faith for Love in New Zealand
Description: A couple decides to take their long-distance relationship to the next level and find a home in Wellington, New Zealand. They're looking for a place near the city with two bedrooms, but staying in budget will be difficult.

Title: Reconnecting Romantically in Rosarito
Description: A married couple looks for a vacation home where they fell in love years ago in Rosarito, Mexico. He wants a condo with no maintenance but she wants a house with a yard, and with differing views, a choice will be difficult.
